name: UIBarButtonItemAppearance
desc: An object for customizing the appearance of bar button items.

items.name: init(style: UIBarButtonItem.Style)
items.desc: Creates an appearance with default values that are appropriate for the specified button style.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an appearance object with default values that are appropriate for a plain button.

items.name: func configureWithDefault(for: UIBarButtonItem.Style)
items.desc: Configures the bar button item appearance object with appropriate values for the specified button style.

items.name: var normal: UIBarButtonItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the button when it is in the normal state.

items.name: var disabled: UIBarButtonItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the button when it is in the disabled state.

items.name: var highlighted: UIBarButtonItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the button when it is in the highlighted state.

items.name: var focused: UIBarButtonItemStateAppearance
items.desc: The appearance data to apply to the button when it is focused.
